TextView.android:text: STADIO is owned by STADIO Holdings Limited, an investment holdings company listed on the Johannesburg Stock Exchange (JSE). STADIO Holdings started as a subsidiary of the private schooling group Curro Holdings, but STADIO Holdings unbundled from Curro in 2017. STADIO Holdings also owns 100% of AFDA (www.afda.co.za) and 82,7% of Milpark Education (www.milpark.ac.za).
